hooks.command: STDIN=$(cat); TRANSCRIPT=$(echo "$STDIN" | jq -r '.transcript_path'); FULL=$(tac "$TRANSCRIPT" | jq -r 'select(.type=="assistant") | .message.content[]? | select(.type=="text") | .text' 2>/dev/null | head -1); MSG=$(printf '%.50s' "$FULL"); if [ "$MSG" != "$FULL" ]; then MSG="$MSG..."; fi; printf '\e]9;Claude: %s\e\\' "$MSG" > /dev/tty
